title: WTB: Various N28s, Ewing N29, Brouthers N162, some N300s
author: Cmvorce

posts.post_title: WTB: Various N28s, Ewing N29, Brouthers N162, some N300s
posts.post_content:
I was pulling funds together for a specific purchase that didn't materialize, so now I have a little bit of money to spend on other things. 

I'm considering a number of options right now and am looking for the following in PSA / SGC 1-2 (or raw equivalent) condition. Please let me know if you have any of these for sale:

N28 A&G John Clarkson
N28 A&G Tim Keefe
N28 A&G John Montgomery Ward

N29 A&G Buck Ewing

N162 Goodwin Champions Dan Brouthers

N300 Mayo Cut Plug Amos Rusie
N300 Mayo Cut Plug Billy Hamilton 
N300 Mayo Cut Plug Ed Delahanty 

Thanks in advance for anything you might have. 

Chris

I have the Ward, it's a PSA 1 but looks much nicer - I would take $1500 net to me,

Matt

Thank, Matt. That Ward looks fantastic. I’m taking a look at everything available and prioritizing what I want to pull the trigger on this time. Will get back to you in a few days. Thanks for posting.
